attributes.action: Enforce Zero Tolerance against Anti Social Behavior, and ensure that Police and Councils take effective and rapid action to protect society and not the offender.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The tragic deaths of the Mother and Daughter in Barwell highlight that fact that after 12 years, all we have from the parliament is more and more legislation which is never backed up by enforcement.  With an election looming MP's of all parties need to realise that clever Home Office statistics don't impress, we need out streets and our lives back.
